Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-red in section, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with pale red-brown slip and remains of six lines of black-painted Demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393864) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393864)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.24)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 24 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
